name: ESC (João Eiras Antunes, Filip Ael, wasinn)
name_original: ESC (João Eiras Antunes, Filip Ael, wasinn)
description:
The key for a life well spent is a healthy routine.
At Eternity Space Craft all your requirements will be met.
Welcome aboard.

Made for Global Game Jam 23 under the theme "Roots"

Credits:
Filip Adolfsson - Music and Sound Design
João Eiras Antunes - Programming and Tech Art
Wasin Laokhot - Sound Design and Visuals
